message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with refining 3D meshes from depth cameras, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. The use of IR shading images is a novel approach that falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also involves analyzing the IR projector light of the Kinect, which falls under graphics (cs.GR). The refinement of geometry is a task that can be applied to robotics (cs.RO) and multimedia (cs.MM) applications. Finally, the paper involves utilizing an initial 3D mesh and multi-view information, which can be seen as a form of machine learning (cs.AI).
